page.title: 16Education
page.content: There is a Primary school at Burrowbridge. At present 45 children from the village and the surrounding area attend the school. They start school in September after their fourth birthday and stay at the school for 7 years. When they are 11 years old they go to either Taunton or Langport for Secondary education. The school at Burrowbridge is near the river Parrett. It has a small playground but no playing field. There are two full time teachers at the school. Most of the children are brought to school by their parents because the road through the village is very dangerous. There used to be a taxi to take the children to school but it was discontinued to save money.
